    • Game

      public Game(int gameID, ArrayList<Player> players, ArrayList<Color> availableColors, GameStatus gameStatus, Player winner, GameTable table, int maxPlayers)
      Constructor
      Parameters:
      gameID - The ID of the game
      players - an arraylist of Player of the game
      availableColors - an arraylist of possible Color that the player can pick
      gameStatus - the GameStatus of the game
      winner - the winner of the game
      table - the GameTable linked to the game

      public Game(int gameId)
      Parameters:
      gameId - The ID for the game This constructor fills automatically all the private fields of this class Sets the Game Status to "WAITING_TO_START"
